participant_id.Description: Unique BIDS identifier for the participant in this study.

subjectkey.Description: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject

src_subject_id.Description: Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project

interview_date.Description: Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY

interview_age.Description: Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging. | Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.

sex.Description: Sex of subject at birth | M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

eventname.Description: The event name for which the data was collected

tox1_results_y.Description: Collection 1: Were any toxicology results positive? | 3=Not applicable (not randomized) ; 1=Yes ; 2=No ; 4=Participant unable to complete ; 5=Participant refused ; 7=Institution not authorized to collect samples due to COVID ; 8=Staff discomfort due to COVID ; 9=Exceed 15min of < 6ft distance from youth (COVID) ; 10=Not approved by ABCD for collection ; 6=Not collected (other)

Levels.7: Institution not authorized to collect samples due to COVID
Levels.10: Not approved by ABCD for collection

tox1_dot_y.Description: Collection 1: date and time saliva toxicology sample done: | Click 'Now' to use current date and time

tox1_results_yn_y.Description: Are test results unexpected based on self-report and or clinical observation? | 1 = Yes; 0 = No; Participant has NOT been assigned to Drager Toxicology Test. Select "Not applicable (not part of 10%)" within next field, change form status to complete, and save.

tox1_coc_y.Description: Positive for Cocaine? | 1 = Yes; 2 = No; 3 = Invalid; Participant has NOT been assigned to Drager Toxicology Test. Select "Not applicable (not part of 10%)" within next field, change form status to complete, and save.

tox1_op_y.Description: Positive for Opiate? | 1 = Yes; 2 = No; 3 = Invalid; Participant has NOT been assigned to Drager Toxicology Test. Select "Not applicable (not part of 10%)" within next field, change form status to complete, and save.

tox1_bzo_y.Description: Positive for Benzodiazepine? | 1 = Yes; 2 = No; 3 = Invalid; Participant has NOT been assigned to Drager Toxicology Test. Select "Not applicable (not part of 10%)" within next field, change form status to complete, and save.

tox1_thc_y.Description: Positive for THC? | 1 = Yes; 2 = No; 3 = Invalid; Participant has NOT been assigned to Drager Toxicology Test. Select "Not applicable (not part of 10%)" within next field, change form status to complete, and save.

tox1_amp_y.Description: Positive for Amphetamine? | 1 = Yes; 2 = No; 3 = Invalid; Participant has NOT been assigned to Drager Toxicology Test. Select "Not applicable (not part of 10%)" within next field, change form status to complete, and save.

tox1_meth_y.Description: Positive for Methamphetamine? | 1 = Yes; 2 = No; 3 = Invalid; Participant has NOT been assigned to Drager Toxicology Test. Select "Not applicable (not part of 10%)" within next field, change form status to complete, and save.

tox1_mtd_y.Description: Positive for Methadone? | 1 = Yes; 2 = No; 3 = Invalid; Participant has NOT been assigned to Drager Toxicology Test. Select "Not applicable (not part of 10%)" within next field, change form status to complete, and save.

tox2_need.Description: Is Toxicology Test Day 2 needed for this participant? | 1 = Yes; 0 = No

tox2_results_y.Description: Collection 1: Were any toxicology results positive? | 1 = Yes; 2 = No; 3 = Not applicable (not part of 10%); 4 = Participant unable to complete; 5 = Participant refused; 6 = Not collected (other)

tox2_dot_y.Description: Collection 1: date and time saliva toxicology sample done: | Click 'Now' to use current date and time

tox1_results_2_y.Description: Collection 2: Were any toxicology results positive? | 3 = Not applicable (not part of 10%); 1 = Yes; 2 = No; 4 = Participant unable to complete; 5 = Participant refused; 6 = Not collected (other)

tox1_dot_2_y.Description: Collection 2: date and time saliva toxicology sample done: | Click 'Now' to use current date and time

tox2_results_2_y.Description: Collection 2: Were any toxicology results positive? | 1 = Yes; 2 = No; 3 = Not applicable (not part of 10% / 15%); 4 = Participant unable to complete; 5 = Participant refused; 6 = Not collected (other)
